functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.name: search

msg.content:
Based on my research, here are the Mythical Pokémon from Generations 1-3:

Generation I:
- Mew (Psychic-type)

Generation II:
- Celebi (Psychic/Grass-type)

Generation III:
- Jirachi (Steel/Psychic-type)
- Deoxys (Psychic-type)

These Pokémon are classified as Mythical due to their rarity and special status in the games, typically being available only through special events. Each of them has unique characteristics:

- Mew is known as the ancestor of all Pokémon and contains the genetic code of all Pokémon
- Celebi is known as the "Voice of the Forest" and has time-traveling abilities
- Jirachi is known as the "Wish Maker" and is said to grant wishes when it awakens
- Deoxys is a virus from space that mutated after exposure to a laser beam, and can change its form
